name: FNF Garcello Test
description:
It's Garcello from Week "G" from Friday Night Funkin Smoke 'Em Out Struggle! Go crazy with his beeps and bops! Credits do really go to Atsuover and Rageminer for making the Friday Night Funkin Smoke 'Em Out Struggle mod! Play on the web here on a PC/Mobile devices! If you want, if you have a windows computer, you can also download it with the download button below!

Controls: 

To switch to touch control, touch the toggle in game.

Arrow keys to play the sounds (For mobile press D-pad button)

Press Space/2/3 (For mobile, hold A/B/Star button) for a special sound 

Secret Key = ??? ;)

Hold any of the buttons to hold a pose!

Check out the Friday Night Funkin here: https://ninja-muffin24.itch.io/funkin

Also check out Friday Night Funkin on Newgrounds: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/770371

Check out the original Friday Night Funkin Smoke 'Em Out Struggle mod:  https://gamebanana.com/mods/166531
